Job Description:
FARM INTERN/VOLUNTEER

Location: Bangalore

Passionate about working with farmers, and working on a real farm  Want to get your hands really dirty  Want to learn about farming and prepare yourself for a career in farming, or want to explore becoming a farmer yourself  If you have a few weeks to put to good use, either as a fresh graduate or while taking a mid-career break, please get in touch with us for short-term (2-3 weeks) and longer term farm internships (3 months). Currently we are recruiting farm interns for only Bangalore and its outskirts. This is a full-time unpaid internship.
Functional Area: Marketing, Advertising, MR, PR, Media Planning,
